categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Troithe operation, also referred to as the Battle at the capital, attack on the capital and battle for the capital district, was a battle initiated by the New Republic to attack enemy forces, led by Governor Hastemoor, shielded within the capital of the planet Troithe. The New Republic captured Troithe's main spaceport within one day of fighting.
